comment: This class was great. Best math class I have ever had, and best math teacher I have ever had!

Seriously one of the most amazing professors that I have ever had. Super funny, super nerdy, and super helpful. He actually cares about the students and actually tries to help. 10/10, would definitely take again.

If you need to take statistics and have been struggling with it since highschool - take him. Best statistics professor ever! He is very helpful, clear, and does everything he can to help you (especially if you're a visual learner)! Gives quizzes everyday (open note) and those quizzes help with the test! Attend class everyday so you won't miss notes

Cool, easy going professor. Gives study guide for tests. 3 Question quizzes at beginning of most classes. Will answer any question you have. Really nice guy! Notes for class are put on D2L before class which Makes it easier to follow along
I was dreading this class, but it turned into one of my favorite classes of the semester!
